identity.description: The unique identity of user for the session.

session_id.description: The unique name for the session.

body.description: The query to ask the assistant.

webhook.description: The webhook url to call after the assistant has generated a response or report an error.

status.description: success or failure based on whether the request successfully generated a response.

flagged.description: If successful, this property will denote whether the response was flagged or not.

aborted.description: This property will denote whether the request was aborted or not.

session_id.description: The unique name for the session.

account_sid.description: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that sent the Message.

body.description: If successful, the body of the generated response

error.description: The error message if generation was not successful

customer_ai.description: The Personalization and Perception Engine settings.

model.description: The default model used by the assistant.

url.description: The url of the assistant resource.

personality_prompt.description: The personality prompt to be used for assistant.

date_updated.description: The date and time in GMT when the Tool was last updated specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.

status.description: The status of processing the knowledge source ('QUEUED', 'PROCESSING', 'COMPLETED', 'FAILED')
